Module com.project4.rupizzeriagui
Package com.project.rupizzeriagui

Class PizzaCustomizationController

java.lang.Object
com.project.rupizzeriagui.PizzaCustomizationController
public class PizzaCustomizationController extends Object
Controller class that specifies the attributes and actions for the Pizza Customization GUI.
Author:
Mervin James, Akshar Patel

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    (package private) void
    onAddButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    Adds a topping to the pizza if the pizza has less than 7 toppings and creates an alert if the user tries to add more than 7 toppings.
    (package private) void
    onAddToOrderClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    Adds pizza to the order and creates an alert informing the user that a pizza has been added to the order.
    (package private) void
    onPizzaSizeChange(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    Changes the size of a pizza based on the combobox selection.
    (package private) void
    onRemoveButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    Removes a topping from the pizza if it is not a default topping.
    private void
    populateFields()
    Populates the fields of the Pizza Customization GUI.
    void
    setMainMenuController(MainMenuController controller)
    Sets the controller to the MainMenuController so that PizzaCustomizationController can share data with MainMenuController.

      public void setMainMenuController(MainMenuController controller)

      Populates the fields of the Pizza Customization GUI.

    • onPizzaSizeChange

      void onPizzaSizeChange(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Changes the size of a pizza based on the combobox selection.
      Parameters:
      event - an event that occurs when a button is clicked.

    • onAddToOrderClick

      void onAddToOrderClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Adds pizza to the order and creates an alert informing the user that a pizza has been added to the order.
      Parameters:
      event - an event that occurs when a button is clicked.

    • onAddButtonClick

      void onAddButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Adds a topping to the pizza if the pizza has less than 7 toppings and creates an alert if the user tries to add more than 7 toppings.
      Parameters:
      event - an event that occurs when a button is clicked.

    • onRemoveButtonClick

      void onRemoveButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Removes a topping from the pizza if it is not a default topping. Creates an alert if the user tries to remove a default topping.
      Parameters:
      event - an event that occurs when a button is clicked.
